Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi

Class PersistenceUnitRef

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi.PersistenceUnitRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
Injectable
public final class PersistenceUnitRef extends Object implements Injectable
A reference to a container-managed EntityManagerFactory.
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • PersistenceUnitRef

      public PersistenceUnitRef()

  • Method Details

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description)
      Sets a description of this persistence unit reference. Corresponds to the description element within persistence-unit-ref in the deployment descriptor.
      Parameters:
      description - a textual description of this reference
      See Also:
      • Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.7: Persistence Unit References

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of this persistence unit reference. Corresponds to the persistence-unit-ref-name element in the deployment descriptor.

      The name is relative to the java:comp/env context.

      Parameters:
      name - the persistence unit reference name
      See Also:
      • Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.7: Persistence Unit References

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this persistence unit reference.
      Returns:
      the persistence unit reference name

    • setUnitName

      public void setUnitName(String unitName)
      Sets the name of the persistence unit. Corresponds to the persistence-unit-name element in the deployment descriptor.

      This identifies the persistence unit defined in persistence.xml that this reference refers to. An EntityManagerFactory for this persistence unit will be injected.

      Parameters:
      unitName - the persistence unit name
      See Also:
      • Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.7: Persistence Unit References

    • init

      public void init(javax.persistence.PersistenceUnit config)
